page.title: 04Education - Pre-school
page.content: {Pre-school }children meet in a playgroup in the{Public Institute }on Tuesday,Thursday and Friday mornings from 9:30 to 12:30. There are about 24 children between the ages of 3 and 5 years and supervision is by three adult volunteers. Each session begins,for the first hour,with social play with the toys available. This is followed by a period when the children paint pictures or make models. A storytime is also included. Seasonal occasions include Christmas parties,Sports days and outings to the beach. For children who are under the age of three there is a mother and toddler group operating once a week.
